channel.title: Run Action with text - How do I get the "text" in the respective "Action" called?
channel.description:
I am calling "Run Action with text" in iOS Shortcut. How do I get the "text" in the respective "Action" called?
Tried the following without success:
`let text = app.getClipboard();`
Could somebody help, please?

item.title: Run Action with text - How do I get the "text" in the respective "Action" called?
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
